meanings.definition: A defensive wall or elevation, as of earth or stone, in a fortification.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers stood guard on the ramparts of the castle.
meanings.sent2: The ancient city had strong ramparts to protect it from invaders.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel climbed the ramparts of the playground structure.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed off the ramparts of his heart.
meanings.sent5: The setting sun cast a warm glow on the ramparts, creating a majestic sight.
